game.description: In the land of Zoria, a powerful dragon has been terrorizing the kingdom. The King has announced a quest to find the Dragon's Lair and slay the beast. Are you brave enough to take on this epic quest?
game.objective: Find the Dragon's Lair and slay the dragon
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and the title of Dragon Slayer

tasks.description: Gather information about the dragon's whereabouts
tasks.objective: Speak with the villagers and gather any information about the dragon's sightings
Explore the forest and find the hidden cave entrance
Engage in a fierce battle with the dragon and defeat it

game.title: The Dragon Slayer
